Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Among users of aspirin , they were : 14 , 671 to rofecoxib , 22 , 875 to celecoxib , 9 , 832 to NS - NSAIDs and 38 , 048 to acetaminophen .

1. Rofecoxib
2. Celecoxib
3. NS-NSAIDs (NS-NSAIDs stands for Non-Steroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drugs, so it's a category of diseases)
4. Acetaminophen

2. Celecoxib
3. NS-NSAIDs (Non-Steroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drugs, which is a category of drugs used to treat various diseases)

These are the disease entities in the given paragraph. They are all medications or categories of medications that are used to treat various medical conditions.
